entries.name: setup_base_spec()
entries.desc: Sets up a generic specification for testing the rubygems installer

entries.name: util_inst_bindir()
entries.desc: The path where installed executables live

entries.name: util_installer(spec, gem_home, user=false)
entries.desc: Creates an installer for spec that will install into gem_home.  If user is true a user-install will be performed.

entries.name: util_make_exec(spec = @spec, shebang = "#!/usr/bin/ruby", bindir = "bin")
entries.desc: Adds an executable named “executable” to spec with the given shebang.

entries.name: util_setup_gem(ui = @ui)
entries.desc: Builds the @spec gem and returns an installer for it.  The built gem includes:

entries.name: util_setup_installer()
entries.desc: Sets up the base @gem, builds it and returns an installer for it.
